name: Trope Raider
description:
All our favorite gaming tropes have disappeared. What do we do now? Explore the insides of an ancient egypt pyramid as a mummy to fight enemies, to collect items and to find out how many tropes you fall for.

Left Mouse Button to attack/interact. Space to jump, Mouse to look around, WASD to move.

Created during Gloabl Game Jam 2015

Jam Site: Technische Universität Darmstadt - Multimedia Communications Lab (KOM)

Technologies: Unity, Blender, Krita, Ableton LiveCredits:

Made by:
- Johannes Alef (3D Models, Programming)
- Michael Rau (Music, SFX)
- Christian Reuter (Programming, Level Design)
- Rebecca Schieren (2D Graphics, Textures)
